days.text: Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.

Mainly fine. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
